name: @newrelic/browser-agent-cdn
description: This is a package that is deployed as a bundle to CDN. It is downloaded by the `agent-loader` package. These two packages are intended to work together.

scripts.build:local: npm run webpack && npm run cleanup
scripts.build:extension: PUBLISH=EXTENSION rm -rf ../build && npm run webpack && npm run cleanup
scripts.build:current: npm run fresh-build && PUBLISH=CURRENT npm run webpack && npm run cleanup
scripts.build:dev: npm run fresh-build && PUBLISH=DEV npm run webpack && npm run cleanup
scripts.build:pr: npm run fresh-build && PUBLISH=PR npm run webpack && npm run cleanup
scripts.build:prod: npm run fresh-build && PUBLISH=PROD npm run webpack && npm run cleanup
scripts.build:nr: npm run fresh-build && PUBLISH=PROD SOURCEMAPS=false npm run webpack && npm run cleanup
